title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.20 - Hearing record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.20 - Hearing record

State Regulations
(a) A verbatim record of the hearing will be made. (b) The hearing testimony, the hearing
exhibits, the agency determination, the hearing officer's official report
containing the substance of what happened at the hearing and the hearing
officer's recommendations, all papers and requests filed in the proceeding
prior to the close of the hearing, the findings of the hearing officer, and the
hearing decision constitute the complete and exclusive record of the
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
